text: An Imung Lai or Emung Lai is any god or goddess worshipped inside the household of the mankind in Meitei folklore and religion. The Imung Lais are the protectors and caretakers of the people. People perform different rites and rituals to worship the deities. The main deities include Sanamahi and Leimarel. ==Related page== * Apokpa == References == == Other websites == Category:Meitei gods and goddesses
title: Imung Lai
